metadata.title: CVE-2022-2992 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions from 11.10 prior to15.1.6, 15.2 to 15.2.4, 15.3 to 15.3.2 allows an authenticated user toachieve remote code execution via the Import from GitHub API endpoint.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'not maintainable').
